name.description: The name of the issue template.

description.description: A short description of the issue template's purpose.

title.description: The default title for issues created with this template.

labels.description: Default labels to apply to issues created with this template.

id.description: A unique identifier for the form element.

label.description: The label for the form element.

description.description: A description providing additional context for the form element.

placeholder.description: A placeholder for the input field (only for input or textarea).

required.description: Whether the form element is required.

body.description: An array of form elements for the template body.
